Lightning Hackday
March 30 & 31, 2019
Bitwork, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong
Ignite Me

Lightning Hackday

Lightning Hackday is a two-day event for developers, technologists and researchers to explore the possibilities and applications of Bitcoin's Lightning Network.
